籤詩版本二:
Abahambi ngeenyawo bakhalazela ukuba kunzima ukuginya umoya wabo.Ukuba kuvele intlekele ngequbuliso, ungasondeli.
Iintaka ezisehlathini ezinendlwane ezaphukileyo azinandawo yokuhlala, kodwa ziyakwazi ukufumana indawo ekhuselekileyo enzulwini.
詩意:
Le hexagram imele intaka kunye neemagpie ezishiya ihlathi.
Yonke into mayenziwe ngokwentliziyo yomntu.
解曰: Ukuba abantu bayacaphuka. Xa ukolula. Yikholwe okanye hayi. Hlala ulondoloza kwaye ulinde.
籤詩故事一:
◇Su Qin Dezhi
Ixesha lamazwe alwayo. USu Qin usuka eLuoyang. Nqula uGu Guzi njengomfundisi wakhe.
Wacela uKumkani waseQin kwaye wabhala amaxesha alishumi elinesibini kodwa akazange amkelwe.
Ibhatyi yesikhumba ikrazukile kwaye imali ayisekho. Hamba ugoduke udiniwe. Emva kokuba ebuyele ekhaya, umfazi wakhe akazange amhoye kwaye udadewabo wala ukupheka.
USu Qin wayeneentloni kwaye enomsindo. Ndafumana iTaigong Yin Talisman (isihloko sale ncwadi) ndaza ndafundisisa nzima.
Ndithe ndisabhidekile ndahlaba ithanga ngentsimbi yentsimbi, kwabuhlungu ndaphinda ndafunda.
Kamva, wasebenzisa ithiyori yomanyano ukudibanisa amazwe amathandathu ukulwa Qin. Cela uKumkani waseZhao ukuba abe yiNkulumbuso yezikumkani eziThandathu.
聖意: Indlu iya kuba sengxakini kuqala, emva koko ithamsanqa.Kulumkele ukufuna ubutyebi kunye nethamsanqa.Ukuthengiselana kuya kukhokelela kwiingxaki zomtshato.Abahambi ngeenyawo baseLiujia bazakuba kwimeko entle.
